item.title: Bitfinex Offline as Customer Bitcoin Reported Stolen - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitfinex Offline as Customer Bitcoin Reported Stolen - CoinDesk

Hong Kong digital currency exchange Bitfinex has taken its trading platform offline following a reported hack that resulted in the theft of customer funds. According to a statement posted on its website, Bitfinex has suspended trading, deposits and withdrawals. Both the number of customers impacted or the exact amount lost in the breach are unclear at this time.

item.title: Exclusive: LexisNexis and start-up join to curb bitcoin money-laundering
item.description:
Exclusive: LexisNexis and start-up join to curb bitcoin money-laundering

LONDON A company that provides banks with anti-money-laundering controls has teamed up with a bitcoin security firm to try to curb nefarious uses of the digital currency, such as drug trafficking and terrorism financing.

item.title: Bitcoin to Hardfork? Proposal Sees Grassroots Beginnings
item.description:
Bitcoin to Hardfork? Proposal Sees Grassroots Beginnings

After a year and a half of debate with no compromise reached, supporters of on-chain scaling, have, seemingly, decided to unilaterally hardfork. A new subreddit, r/btcfork, was announced earlier today, quickly gaining attention and momentum with numerous threads published in just hours after the announcement was made and many bitcoiners joining in the lively debate.

item.title: Indacoin: Buying Bitcoin, Litecoin with a Credit Card
item.description:
Indacoin: Buying Bitcoin, Litecoin with a Credit Card

Indacoin is an exchange service that allows users to buy bitcoin and litecoin with debit or credit cards. With customers across the world, in areas such as the US, Canada, Europe and the CIS region, this platform aims to make bitcoin more accessible to the average person.

item.title: Expected Ethereum Hashrate of the New AMD Radeon RX 470 GPUs
item.description:
Expected Ethereum Hashrate of the New AMD Radeon RX 470 GPUs

The new AMD Radeon RX 470 GPUs are supposed to start hitting the market in a few days and since their bigger brother - the RX 480 has turned out to be a good choice for Ethereum mining, although it did not perform that good in other algorithms, people are interested in how well the RX 470 does.

item.title: Bitfinex security breach: Trading will be halted as well as all crypto deposits/withdrawals * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
Bitfinex security breach: Trading will be halted as well as all crypto deposits/withdrawals * /r/Bitcoin

Today we discovered a security breach that requires us to halt all trading on Bitfinex, as well as halt all digital token deposits to and...

item.title: Another Ethereum Fork in the Making - Classic Ethereum (CETH)
item.description:
Another Ethereum Fork in the Making - Classic Ethereum (CETH)

A post on reddit has bee published today that introduces Classic Ethereum (CETH) - another Ethereum (ETH) for that is apparently in the making at the moment. Just like Ethereum Classic (ETC) the new Classic Ethereum (CETH) fork will follow the original Ethereum blockchain until the controversial block 1920000 where it will fork with a small signature change to make replay attacks impossible.

item.title: Security Breach on Bitfinex, Trading Was Halted
item.description:
Security Breach on Bitfinex, Trading Was Halted

The crypto currency exchange Bitfinex has officially announced that it has experienced a security breach and as a result had to halt trading and stop access for everyone until the situation is resolved. As a result of the hack it seems that the funds of some users of the exchange have been stolen, but nobody knows how bad the situation was apparently.

item.title: Bitfinex Hacked, Bitcoin Confirmed Stolen - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Bitfinex Hacked, Bitcoin Confirmed Stolen - Bitcoinist.net

On August 2, 2016, it has been reported that the major cryptocurrency exchange, Bitfinex, was hacked with some customers losing Bitcoin as a result. Additionally, BitGo has commented on the event. Also read: Indacoin: Buying Bitcoin, Litecoin with a Credit Card Bitfinex itself confirmed the hack in a press release earlier today, saying they have halted all trading on the platform.

item.title: UNICEF Blockchain to improve child welfare | HolyTransaction
item.description:
UNICEF Blockchain to improve child welfare | HolyTransaction

UNICEF is looking for a software developer and consultant to develop and lead its blockchain project. The United Nations Children's Fund, in fact, revelaed how the organization wants to use the distributed ledger to improve child welfare worldwide.
